title: Duckhorn Portfolio Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, July 23, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an elegant tasting featuring standout selections from the Duckhorn Portfolio, including wines from Duckhorn, Goldeneye, and more. This is a great opportunity to experience the depth and sophistication of one of Napa Valley’s most iconic producers.

Tasting Fee: $40 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Duckhorn Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Rich and plush with spiced blackberry, blueberry cobbler, milk chocolate, licorice, and a long, luxurious finish.

• Duckhorn Napa Valley Merlot 2022 – 92 pts, Wine Spectator. Vibrant and polished with red currant, cherry, toasty spice, and refined tannins.

• Goldeneye Anderson Valley Pinot Noir 2022 – 92 pts, James Suckling. Silky and balanced with red cherry, strawberry, rhubarb, and subtle oak complexity.

• Duckhorn Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 91 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Crisp and lively with Meyer lemon, papaya, white nectarine, and grapefruit zest on a dry, mineral finish.

Explore the craftsmanship and range of the Duckhorn family of wines—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
